natural solution: From the angle addition formula, \begin{align} \tan \left( x + \frac{\pi}{4} \right) &= \frac{\tan x + \tan \frac{\pi}{4}}{1 - \tan x \tan \frac{\pi}{4}} \\ &= \frac{1 + 2}{1 - 2 \cdot 1} \\ &= \boxed{-3}.
